scripts.deploy-dev: aws s3 rm s3://dlts-open-square-search-application-dev/search --recursive && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://dlts-open-square-search-application-dev/search --exclude 'books/*' --exclude 'css/*' --exclude 'open-square-reader/*'
scripts.deploy-stage: aws s3 rm s3://dlts-open-square-search-application-stage/search --recursive && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://dlts-open-square-search-application-stage/search --exclude 'books/*' --exclude 'css/*' --exclude 'open-square-reader/*'
scripts.deploy: aws s3 rm s3://dlts-open-square-search-application/search --recursive && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://dlts-open-square-search-application/search --exclude 'books/*' --exclude 'css/*' --exclude 'open-square-reader/*'
